run_sweep[source]

run_sweep(sweep_config:"Dictionary or path to YAML file with the sweep config", program:"Path to Python training script", launch:"Launch wanbd agent."=True, count:"Number of runs to execute"=None, entity:"username or team name where you're sending runs"=None, project:"The name of the project where you're sending the new run."=None, sweep_id:"Sweep ID. This option omits sweep_config"=None, relogin:"Relogin to wandb."=False, login_key:"Login key for wandb"=None, tags:"Tag assigned to this run"=None, path:"Path to a directory where metadata will be stored."='./wandb')
